name: Stretch Arm Slam
description:
Created for #MovieGameJam

Based on the popular 90's movie Space Jam.

Dunk as man times as you can before the time runs out! The monster team will try to slow down your movement when you jump, but thankfully, you can just stretch out your arm for that much needed extra reach! 

Goals also give you extra time, but that may just be one of the ways the monster team may try to cheat in order to win.
